availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George W. King (Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer )

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer. Harrison County, Kentucky, native. Son of Richard King and Cynthia Crawford King. Married to Margaret Smith King in Harrison County, Kentucky, on November 8, 1858. Resident of Harrison County in 1850. Farmer in Harrison County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, District 2, p. 123A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Harrison County, KY, June and July 1863, p. 221.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994037, Harrison County Marriages.
Kentucky Marriage Records, 1783-1965, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Harrison County Marriages, 1794-1937, Film #000216892.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Harrison County Marriages, Film #000216897, p. 15.
